entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow over southern sections this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
